title: Strengthening Social Service Management Competencies Through Practice-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social service management concepts comprehension
context.additional_context: Most learners access content solely via smartphones and require case-based learning due to limited practical experience

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three or more practical problems occurring in social service settings and propose solutions.
Learners can establish individual learning goals and develop action plans based on case studies provided through the LMS.
Learners can continuously improve their practical performance skills through peer feedback and instructor evaluations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
